class.name: ScriptServer
class.description: ScriptServer manages all information related to global script classes in Godot projects, similar to [ClassDB] for engine classes. Scripts independently opt-in to become global classes. With it, you can check if a script has a global name or icon, what its base classes are, or even instantiate them directly. [b]Note:[/b] This class shouldn't be instantiated directly. Instead, access the singleton through a global variable.

method.name: get_global_class_base
method.description: Returns the class name that the script named [code]class[/code] directly extends. This may be an engine class or another global script class.

method.name: get_global_class_list
method.description: Returns the names of all global script class names known by the ScriptServer.

method.name: get_global_class_map
get_global_class_name
method.description: Returns the global class name bound to the [Script] at [code]path[/code].

method.name: get_global_class_native_base
method.description: Returns the native engine class that the script named [code]class[/code] eventually extends.

method.name: get_global_class_path
method.description: Returns the file path to the script resource named [code]class[/code].

method.name: instantiate_global_class
method.description: Returns a new instance of the scripted type defined by the script named [code]class[/code].

method.name: is_global_class
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the name [code]class[/code] is a global script class.
